• The actual number of people who die from heat will be much higher, but a warming planet will also result in fewer deaths from cold

items.title: DOJ settles with RealPage over its software’s alleged rent price fixing
bullets: • The Department of Justice announced a settlement with RealPage, the widely used rent-setting software
• RealPage was accused of engaging in collusion to drive up rent prices by sharing previously private information from competing landlords
• The settlement puts limits on RealPage’s ability to collect and use that data, and blocks it from being used to set rents

items.title: Signal’s secure message backups arrive on iOS
bullets: • Signal is launching secure backups on iOS, allowing you to save and restore your messages in case you lose or break your phone
• With the free version of the feature, you can store up to 100MB of text messages, along with the past 45 days’ worth of photos, videos, GIFs, and files
• Signal plans on bringing secure backups to its desktop app, too, and will eventually allow you to transfer your encrypted messages between Android, iOS, and desktop
